title: [FEATURE] AspectFill and AspectFit: extra arguments for alignment?
body:
Currently the `SKRect.AspectFill` and `SKRect.AspectFit` methods always center the resulting rectangle in `this` rectangle.

It feel more flexible to me to add two extra arguments to these methods, with default values `0.5f`, that describe the alignment of the resulting rectangle in the `this` rectangle? 0 means align to left or top,  1 means align to right or bottom, all values in between shift proportionally.

If this is not acceptable, I would propose to enhance the documentation? It currently doesn't mention the centering behavior.

A more orthogonal API approach would be to add `SKRect.Align` methods that align a rectangle in `this` rectangle, using similar `0..1` alignment arguments?

Thanks,
Peter
